analysis.key_quote: About 95 percent of respondents thought that civil servants should be hired and promoted on merit rather than according to political beliefs, and 90 percent said that civil servants should serve the people more than any president.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting public sentiment against politicization of civil service and emphasizing the importance of merit-based hiring and promotion. It also raises concerns about the potential negative impact of the rule on effective governance.
